thread.section_title: BMW-Motorrad-Store Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von BMW-Motorrad-Store | bmw-motorrad-store.de
thread.title: Susan Brown

author: Susan Brown
title: Susan Brown
text:
Sent query when placing order, this was quickly responded to.
Order arrived in less than a week to UK.
Only comment would be is that it would have been nice to have received an email advising the items had been despatched and who would be delivering, so we could make sure someone was here to take delivery. Left outside of property as no one was here. Thank fully still there when we got home...
